snippet: Miguel Cotto will take to the ring at Madison Square Garden after a tribute is held for Hector Camacho, who died after being shot recently.
abstract: Austrin Trout beats Miguel Cotto by unanimous decision after 12 rounds to retain his WBA super welterweight title.
lead_paragraph: Miguel Cotto will take to the ring at Madison Square Garden after a tribute is held for Hector Camacho, who died after being shot recently.

headline.seo: Title Fight for Miguel Cotto, and a Final Toll for Hector Camacho
headline.main: For Cotto, a Chance to Capture a Title and to Honor the Legacy of Camacho
headline.print_headline: Shaken in First, Cotto Is Beaten After 12th
